entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 a.m. EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
